channel.title: cliffy_jr TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from cliffy_jr

item.title: It’s not about engine size, brand, or build. Just ride what makes you feel good, and keep showing up. #motorcycle #RideYourRide #AllBikesWelcome #TwoWheelsOneLove #MotoFreedom
item.description: It’s not about engine size, brand, or build. Just ride what makes you feel good, and keep showing up. #motorcycle #RideYourRide #AllBikesWelcome #TwoWheelsOneLove #MotoFreedom
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Freeway connectors are long, fast curves. Look all the way through the turn, lean with confidence, and maintain steady throttle. #motorcycle #FreewayConnector #TurnWithConfidence #CorneringTips #RideSmooth
item.description: Freeway connectors are long, fast curves. Look all the way through the turn, lean with confidence, and maintain steady throttle. #motorcycle #FreewayConnector #TurnWithConfidence #CorneringTips #RideSmooth
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: If you’ve never been to a rave, put it on your list. Music, energy, and freedom—it’s a vibe you have to feel for yourself. #RaveCulture #LiveTheMoment #MusicAndMotion #GoodVibesOnly
item.description: If you’ve never been to a rave, put it on your list. Music, energy, and freedom—it’s a vibe you have to feel for yourself. #RaveCulture #LiveTheMoment #MusicAndMotion #GoodVibesOnly
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Front brake = main stopping power. Rear brake = stability and low-speed control. Engine brake = roll off the throttle to slow the bike naturally. Learn to use all three for smooth, safe riding. #motorcycle #BrakeControl #FrontBrake #RearBrake #EngineBraki
item.description: Front brake = main stopping power. Rear brake = stability and low-speed control. Engine brake = roll off the throttle to slow the bike naturally. Learn to use all three for smooth, safe riding. #motorcycle #BrakeControl #FrontBrake #RearBrake #EngineBraki
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Before you turn, slow down and look where you want to go. Use steady throttle through the corner and trust your lean. #motorcycle #LeftTurnPractice #RideControl #CorneringBasics #TwoWheelSkills
item.description: Before you turn, slow down and look where you want to go. Use steady throttle through the corner and trust your lean. #motorcycle #LeftTurnPractice #RideControl #CorneringBasics #TwoWheelSkills
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Stalls happen. Don’t panic. Restart, clutch in, throttle steady, and try again. Every rider goes through it—it’s how you learn. #motorcycle #StallRecovery #BeginnerRider #RideWithPatience #ClutchWork
item.description: Stalls happen. Don’t panic. Restart, clutch in, throttle steady, and try again. Every rider goes through it—it’s how you learn. #motorcycle #StallRecovery #BeginnerRider #RideWithPatience #ClutchWork
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Emergency braking isn’t about slamming—it’s about smooth, progressive pressure. Squeeze the front brake, use the rear to stabilize, and don’t panic. Practice in a parking lot. #motorcycle #EmergencyBraking #BrakePractice #RidePrepared #StopWithControl
item.description: Emergency braking isn’t about slamming—it’s about smooth, progressive pressure. Squeeze the front brake, use the rear to stabilize, and don’t panic. Practice in a parking lot. #motorcycle #EmergencyBraking #BrakePractice #RidePrepared #StopWithControl
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Let’s practice riding a motorcycle. Stalling is a normal part of learning how to ride and even when you learn how you still stall sometimes too. #Motorcycle #Moto #Stall #LearnHowToRideAMotorcycle
item.description: Let’s practice riding a motorcycle. Stalling is a normal part of learning how to ride and even when you learn how you still stall sometimes too. #Motorcycle #Moto #Stall #LearnHowToRideAMotorcycle
item.author: cliffy_jr
